name: Monkey Money 2 Slots for Mac
description:
The monkey is back, and he's brought a tuxedo! With 8 different game features and 25 or 50 paylines, it's Monkey Money 2 HD!

Can you accomplish all 45 special achievements? Try it now and see...
During normal play the Monkey acts as a wildcard and substitutes for all symbols except scattered coins symbols. Scattered coin symbols pay anywhere in the window.

3 or more coins showing anywhere in the game window (4 in the Special Edition) triggers the Wild Monkey free games. 4 or more coins (5 in the Special Edition) triggers the Monkey Scratch Feature

There are 8 different game features to play as well as blackjack and roulette doubleups!

Can you get 10/10 numbers in Monkeno? Beat the monkey in the Cocopot Jackpot? Try it now and see!

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble. Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
